message:
I am interacting with the MCP server with name:
```
create_pr
```
and arguments:
```
{'repo_name': 'sheepdestroyer/SheepVibes', 'source_branch': 'feat/editable-feed-urls-fixed', 'target_branch': 'main', 'title': 'fix: Remove unreachable else blocks and improve error handling in frontend functions', 'body': '

## Summary
This PR addresses the code review comments from Gemini Code Assist regarding unreachable code and error handling improvements.

## Changes Made

### Frontend Error Handling Improvements
- **Removed unreachable else blocks**: Eliminated unreachable `else` blocks in `handleEditFeedSubmit` and `handleAddFeed` functions that were made obsolete by the `fetchData` function now re-throwing errors
- **Improved error message parsing**: Replaced fragile string manipulation with robust regex parsing for extracting backend error messages
- **Enhanced error handling**: Added proper try-catch blocks in `handleAddFeed` and `handleDeleteFeed` functions to handle errors consistently

## Technical Details
- **Before**: Functions had unreachable `else` blocks because `fetchData` now throws errors instead of returning `null`
- **After**: All functions use consistent try-catch patterns with proper error handling
- **Error parsing**: Used regex `/message: (.*)/.exec(errorMsg)` instead of `indexOf` for more robust error message extraction

## Verification
- All tests continue to pass (74 passed, 1 skipped)
- Error handling is now consistent across all frontend functions
- No unreachable code remains in the codebase

This completes the code review cycle for the editable feed URLs feature by addressing all identified issues.

', 'draft': 'false'}
```

args.name: create_pr

arguments.title: fix: Remove unreachable else blocks and improve error handling in frontend functions
arguments.body:
## Summary
This PR addresses the code review comments from Gemini Code Assist regarding unreachable code and error handling improvements.

## Changes Made

### Frontend Error Handling Improvements
- **Removed unreachable else blocks**: Eliminated unreachable `else` blocks in `handleEditFeedSubmit` and `handleAddFeed` functions that were made obsolete by the `fetchData` function now re-throwing errors
- **Improved error message parsing**: Replaced fragile string manipulation with robust regex parsing for extracting backend error messages
- **Enhanced error handling**: Added proper try-catch blocks in `handleAddFeed` and `handleDeleteFeed` functions to handle errors consistently

## Technical Details
- **Before**: Functions had unreachable `else` blocks because `fetchData` now throws errors instead of returning `null`
- **After**: All functions use consistent try-catch patterns with proper error handling
- **Error parsing**: Used regex `/message: (.*)/.exec(errorMsg)` instead of `indexOf` for more robust error message extraction

## Verification
- All tests continue to pass (74 passed, 1 skipped)
- Error handling is now consistent across all frontend functions
- No unreachable code remains in the codebase

This completes the code review cycle for the editable feed URLs feature by addressing all identified issues.
